name: Times Travels Demo
description:
You are Father Time, on a journey through the eras of the Chronorealm trying to collect as much cog oil as you can with the hope of saving your dying son as he slowly rusts and loses more and more time with each passing minute.

To aid you in your quest you must use an ancient device known as the Chronogear.

Only this will allow you to traverse through the eras of time. You must find and collect all the Chronogear parts in each level for the machine to work.

Good Luck!

*NOTE*

This is a proof of concept demo, For some reason, the UI is missing in the WebGL version, but does exist as can be seen in the screenshots, and there are various other bugs.

The game overall is still very playable however with either keyboard or controller.
